remarks: Axiom of Infinity ~ ax-inf , reproved from conditionless ZFC axioms. Since we have already reproved Extensionality, Replacement, and Power Sets above, we are justified in referencing theorem ~ el in the proof. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 15-Aug-2003.)
statement:
zfcndinf $p |- E. y ( x e. y /\ A. z ( z e. y -> E. w ( z e. w /\ w e. y ) ) ) $.
$d w x y z $.
